member.name: IPublishingWizard.GetTransferManifest

summary.para: Gets a transfer manifest for a file transfer operation performed by a publishing wizard, such as the Online Print Wizard or the Add Network Place Wizard.
summary.div: Note This method is deprecated for Windows Vista, as it is not supported for Online Print Wizard or Add Network Place Wizard.

member.param: A pointer to a variable of type HRESULT that, when this method returns, is set to S_OK if the transfer operation was successful, S_FALSE if the transfer has not yet begun, or a standard error value if the transfer has failed or has been canceled. This value can be NULL if you do not require this information.
Address of an IXMLDOMDocument interface pointer that, when this method returns, points to the IXMLDOMDocument interface object that represents the manifest. This value can be NULL.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if the manifest is successfully retrieved or a standard COM error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description: The transfer manifest has not yet been created.

member.name: IPublishingWizard.Initialize

summary.para: Initializes the Publishing Wizard object with the files to transfer, the settings to use, and the type of wizard to create.
summary.div: Note Windows Vista no longer supports the Online Print Wizard. However, this method can still be used to generate the Add Network Place Wizard.

member.param: A pointer to an instance of that represents the files or folder to be transferred, if pszServiceProvider is InternetPhotoPrinting. If pszServiceProvider is AddNetPlace, this parameter is NULL.

param.name: dwOptions
param.para: A combination of the following flags.
Do not allow recompression of image data. For use with the Online Print Wizard.
Do not create a network place shortcut when the data transfer is complete. This flag is for use with the Add Network Place Wizard.
Do not allow the user to change the file selection within the wizard.

Windows Vista and later. For use with the Add Network Place Wizard. If this flag is set, and pszServiceProvider is AddNetPlace, the Add Network Place wizard shows an option to select a network location other than the locations or providers that are registered to appear in the wizard.

For use with the Add Network Place Wizard. In Windows XP, if this flag is set and an attempt to open the network location using WebDAV fails, the Add Network Place Wizard attempts to create a web folder for the location, using support for WEC. In Windows Vista and Windows Server 2003, this flag has no effect and network locations without support for WebDAV may not be opened as web folders.

param.name: pszServiceScope
param.para: Unicode string that indicates the type of wizard to display. The following case-sensitive values are supported in Windows Vista.
Initialize the Add Network Place Wizard.
Initialize the Online Print Wizard. Not supported in Windows Vista.

returns.para: Returns S_OK if successful or an error value otherwise, including the following:

listheader.description:
In Windows Vista, may indicate an attempt to initialize the unsupported Online Print Wizard by passing InternetPhotoPrinting in pszServiceProvider.
In Windows XP, may indicate that when initializing the Online Print Wizard, the pdo parameter is NULL or points to an empty selection.
The pszServiceProvider parameter is not one of the supported values or the dwOptions parameter contains an unsupported combination of flags.

member.name: IPublishingWizard
member.summary: Exposes methods for working with the Online Print Wizard, the Web Publishing Wizard, and the Add Network Place Wizard. In Windows Vista, IPublishingWizard no longer supports the Web Publishing Wizard or Online Print Wizard.
